settings.title: Jacqueline S.
settings.content: I was skeptical at first, thinking this would be just another disappointment. But wow, was I wrong! I now own two and will definitely be buying more. The comfort is unmatched, the support is amazing, and the best part? It holds up perfectly in the wash no need to remove the padding!

settings.title: Emily A.
settings.content: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

settings.title: Brenda W.
settings.content: I’m truly amazed at how well this bra fits! It stays in place all day without rolling up or needing constant adjustments like others I’ve tried. The support and comfort are unmatched definitely my new go-to, and I’ll be getting more!

settings.title: Elizabeth R.
settings.content: I absolutely love the fabric it's incredibly soft with just the right amount of stretch! It feels so gentle against the skin, making it perfect for all-day wear. Plus, the support is amazing, giving me both comfort and confidence throughout the day!

settings.title: Maria V.
settings.content: I wasn’t expecting much from this bra, but I’m honestly so impressed! It’s incredibly comfortable, stays in place all day, and provides a great lift while smoothing my back. It may not be the most stylish bra out there, but it does exactly what I need and I’m already planning to buy more!

settings.title: Janice L.
settings.content: This bra is an absolute game-changer! The comfort is unmatched, and the lift is incredible. It fits so seamlessly that I forget I’m even wearing it definitely a new favorite!

settings.title: Specifications
settings.content:
Say goodbye to back bulges and hello to a sleek, sculpted silhouette. Designed to smooth, lift, and support, this bra gives you an effortlessly flattering shape with ultimate all-day comfort—no pinching, no rolling, just a perfect fit every time.

✅ 100% Back Smoothing – No more bra lines or bulges, just a seamless look.
⬆️ Gravity-Defying Lift – Gradual lift cups enhance your natural shape.
🤍 Second-Skin Fit – Hugs your body for maximum comfort and support.
✨ Invisible Under Clothing – Smooths flawlessly under any top or dress.

Fabric: 80% Nylon | 20% Spandex
Lining: 83% Viscose | 17% Polyester
Care: Machine wash cold. Do not bleach. Lay flat to dry.

settings.title: Try it free for 30 days
settings.content: Try MileVia risk-free for 30 days. If you're not completely satisfied with your product, you can return it and receive a full refund.

settings.title: Free Shipping
settings.content: Get your MileVia delivered with free shipping in just 5-10 days.

settings.title: What makes your bras different?
settings.content: Our bras are designed for ultimate comfort, support, and a seamless fit. They stay in place all day, provide a natural lift, and smooth out your shape without feeling restrictive.

settings.title: Can I wear this bra all day?
settings.content: Absolutely! Our bras are made from ultra-soft, breathable fabric that’s perfect for all-day wear, so comfortable, you might even forget you’re wearing one!

settings.title: How do I wash my bra?
settings.content: For best results, we recommend hand washing or using a gentle cycle in a laundry bag. Avoid bleach and high heat to maintain the fabric’s quality.

settings.title: Do you offer free shipping?
settings.content: Yes! We offer free shipping on all orders!
